hero.title: I'm Amira, a
hero.aboutText:
I'm a passionate junior full-stack developer and projet manager in Codex Junior Enterprise completeing my engineering cycle.
I love creating innovative solutions for real world problems.
I'm always eager to learn and grow in this ever-evolving field.
hero.educationText: I've recently earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I'm currently completing my engineering studies at ISI Ariana, specializing in Software Development.

projects.title: My PORTFOLIO
projects.secondTitle: Take a look at the lastest projects I've done.

exp0.description:
Manage project development in CodexJE:
 Manage a team of developers.
 Assign tasks. 
 Control the development process.
 Participate in the coding process.

exp1.description:
Development of a dynamic report automation module to generate project management reports.
This module provides fully customizable reports for each project, including a summary adapted to their contents generated by an AI module.

exp2.description: Development of a dynamic website containing a back office allowing the management of a showcase.

about.title: Nice to meet you!
about.text:
I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a love for creating digital solutions that make a difference.
My journey in web development began with curiosity about how can I solve complex real world problems using technology.
